{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05012v1", "title": "Descriptive Complexity of Sensitivity of Cellular Automata", "summary": "We study the computational complexity of determining whether a cellular
automaton is sensitive to initial conditions. We show that this problem is
$\Pi^0_2$-complete in dimension 1 and $\Sigma^0_3$-complete in dimension 2 and
higher. This solves a question posed by Sablik and Theyssier.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS,cs.CC,math.LO", "published": "2025-04-07T12:38:07Z"}
